metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10345 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Phusion Passenger before 5.1.0, a known /tmp filename was used during passenger-install-nginx-module execution, which could allow local attackers to gain the privileges of the passenger user.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> the affected binary, passenger-install-nginx-module, is not installed from Ubuntu package (as in Debian), so this issue does not affect any Ubuntu releases.

criterions.comment: passenger package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
